successes.title: The Apocrypha Adventure Card Game
successes.description: A card game and roleplaying game in one box, from Mike Selinker and the designers of the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game.

Pledges.description: REVELATION BOX: The Revelation base set and first chapter of the Apocrypha story. This box contains at least 500 cards, 16 dice, dividers, and character tokens. (You can add additional boxes for $66 more apiece.)

REVELATION BOX (CANADA, EUROPEAN UNION): The Revelation base set and first chapter of the Apocrypha story. This box contains at least 500 cards, 16 dice, dividers, and character tokens. (You can add additional boxes for $66 more apiece.) This will be shipped from the region of origin, and will be EU friendly.

REVELATION BOX (AUSTRALIA): The Revelation base set and first chapter of the Apocrypha story. This box contains at least 500 cards, 16 dice, dividers, and character tokens. (You can add additional boxes for $66 more apiece.) This will be shipped from the region of origin, and will be EU friendly.
REVELATION BOX AND ALL CHAPTERS: The base set as above and every 75-card chapter we unlock starting with the Deathless. (You can add more boxes for $99 apiece.)

REVELATION BOX AND ALL CHAPTERS (CANADA, EUROPEAN UNION): The base set as above and every 75-card chapter we unlock starting with the Deathless. (You can add additional boxes for $99 more apiece.) This will be shipped from the country or region of origin, and will be EU friendly.
REVELATION BOX AND ALL CHAPTERS (AUSTRALIA): The base set as above and every 75-card chapter we unlock starting with the Deathless. (You can add additional boxes for $99 more apiece.)

THE MASTER'S EDITION: The deluxe edition of the game, with all contents of the Revelation Box and all chapters, plus a gorgeous case, custom dice, a dice bag, and other amazing accoutrements, signed by Mike Selinker. (You can add more Master's Editions for $333 apiece.)

THE MASTER'S EDITION (CANADA, EUROPEAN UNION): The deluxe edition of the game, with all contents of the Revelation Box and all chapters, plus a gorgeous case, custom dice, a dice bag, and other amazing accoutrements, signed by Mike Selinker. (You can add more Master's Editions for $333 apiece.) This will be shipped from the country or region of origin, and will be EU friendly.

THE MASTER'S EDITION (AUSTRALIA): The deluxe edition of the game, with all contents of the Revelation Box and all chapters, plus a gorgeous case, custom dice, a dice bag, and other amazing accoutrements, signed by Mike Selinker. (You can add more Master's Editions for $333 apiece.)

THE BEAST BOX: 1 Master's Edition signed by all the developers, 1 signed Revelation Box with all the chapters, 1 Ultra PRO character binder, 2 Ultra PRO mission playmats, 18 Ultra PRO deckboxes (9 of Hope, 9 of Doom), 1,300+ Ultra PRO sleeves, 5 more sets of dice so every player can have a set, and printed stories and selections from the Apocrypha Bible.

RETAILER CRATE: 10 Revelation Boxes with all the chapters, 10 copies of the 9-card promo pack, an exclusive retailer demo kit including a version of the game for your store with demo play instructions and giveaway cards for demos, promo signs for your store, and mentions of your store on our site and social media. Shipping is free to the US, Canada, and the EU, and $75 elsewhere. This is for retailers and distributors ONLY; we will not fulfill this level direct to consumers.

YOU APPEAR IN OUR GAME: Everything at the $333 level, plus you will be artistically portrayed inside the game itself. You will provide us with references and we will paint you into the game. We cannot guarantee you will be human.
